title: Raspberry Sorbet
directions: Process raspberries and ½ cup of water until smooth.
Strain out raspberries seeds, refrigerate juice overnight.
Boil 4 cups water with sugar with medium high heat stirring for 10 mins.
Transfer mixture to an ice batch and stir until well chilled. Refrigerate until ready to use.
Mix mixture in an ice cream maker for 12 mins, and let freeze overnight.
